name: Levitation (Toonlink3000)
description:
A small simple game made in unity.  (My first game!)

[UPDATE] Wow! Im so happy that someone actually took some time to download my game. Im actualy thinking about exporting a web GL version too!! Thx!!

Also i would be interested if someone actually played it.

The game consists of 5 levels with lots of different genres.

you control a Cube going through:

  • Platformer Levels
  • Dropper levels
  • Speedrun levels
  • More comming soon!

So, do you want to join in?
